title: Refactor ESP8266 connect flows to non-blocking state machines
description: Replace long blocking delay/while connect loops in WiFi and MQTT paths with non-blocking state transitions and bounded retry backoff. Verify watchdog stability and reconnect behavior.

title: Harden MQTT/OTA security baseline for ESP12 monitor
description: Adopt TLS-capable MQTT transport strategy for production profiles, add OTA integrity/auth hardening, and validate secret handling/log redaction in config paths.

comments.author: Jhan-Wei Jhan
comments.text: Implemented initial hardening in commit 1a0ae13+: AP-only WiFi setup endpoints, async non-blocking apply flow, MQTT payload size guard, and config input validation. Remaining scope: TLS transport migration and OTA integrity/signing rollout.

title: Validate Go sender v2 build and runtime on Ubuntu/Windows CI
description: Go toolchain was unavailable in implementation environment. Add CI jobs for go mod tidy, go test, and binary smoke run on Ubuntu + Windows.

title: Run hardware E2E soak test for metrics v2 firmware
description: Execute 8-device, 1Hz 30-minute soak on ESP12 hardware and record latency/availability metrics plus reconnection behavior.
